name: Verify unsuccessful booking of a table to for an invalid location

steps.name: When the user sends a POST request to the end point for booking a table "table-204" for "5" people from "17:30" to "19:00" at location "location-005"
Then the response status code must be 400
And the response message should be "locationId doesn't exist!"
